full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/18/2023 MEMORANDUM PRINTING OFFICE: 1977-231-387 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service MEMORANDUM OF CREATION OF RECORD OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE Place Los Angles, CALIFORN IA File No. A21 198 924 Status as a lawful permanent resident of the United States is accorded: Date: SEX DATE OF BIRTH Name PHAM, Thao Van 1805 West Adams street male 2-10-1915 Street Address SANTA ANA, PLACE OF BIRTH City, State, Zip CALIFORNIA. 92704 Ha-Linh, Vietnam NATIONALITY COUNTRY TO WHICH CHARGEABLE (If any) PREFERENCE (If any) VIETNAMESE PRIORITY DATE REMARKS Indochina Refugee NONPREFERENCE: Section 212(a)(14) certification not required because: Individual section 212(a)(14) certification issued Blanket section 212(a)(14) certification issued under the following provision of law: Sec 203(h) of the I & N Act Sec 249 of the I & N Act Sec 214(d) I & N Act Private Law no. of the Sec 244( )( ) of the I & N Act Sec 1 of the Act of 11/2/66 Congress session Sec 245 of the I & N Act Sec 13 of the Act of 9/11/57 XX Public Law 95-145 (Other law Specify) As of JUN 4 75 at Los Angles, CALIFORNIA.
